channel.title: Payments Service on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in Payments Service on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Faster Payments Logo
The Faster Payments Service is a United Kingdom banking initiative to reduce payment times between different banks' customer accounts to typically a few seconds, from the three working days that transfers usually take using the long-established BACS system. CHAPS, which was introduced in 1984, provides a limited faster-than-BACS service for “high value” transactions, while FPS is focused on the much larger number of smaller payments, subject to limits set by the individual banks, with some allowing Faster Payments of up to £250,000.
You can download theFaster Paymentslogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Faster Payments
item.description: The Faster Payments Service is a United Kingdom banking initiative to reduce payment times between different banks' customer accounts to typically a few seconds, from the three working days that transfers usually take using the long-established BACS system. CHAPS, which was introduced in 1984, provides a limited faster-than-BACS service for “high value” transactions, while FPS is focused on the much larger number of smaller payments, subject to limits set by the individual banks, with some allowing Faster Payments of up to £250,000.
